CustomField.formula: IF(AND(checkForDamage__c=true, checkForWinterTires__c=true, Stickers_are_removed__c=true, INCLUDES(Check_for_Milage__c, "Max. is not exceeded"), OR(AND(INCLUDES(Check_for_Milage__c, "Min. is reached"),Plates_are_removed__c=true), Plates_are_removed__c=false) ), 'Ready', 'Not Ready')
CustomField.label: Defleet Ready Check
